alert.note: Alert for Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:26PM EDT until June 29 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Lakeview to 6 miles north of Greenville to 8 miles northeast of Sparta, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville... Stanton... Carson City... Lakeview... Crystal... Sidney... Sheridan... McBride... Langston... Westville... Gowen... Entrican... Turk Lake... Butternut... Fenwick... Greenville Municipal... Kings Corner... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
